ccre.chan

Interface FloatInputProducer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FloatInput, FloatTuner
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFloatTuner, CompoundFloatTuner, FloatStatus

    public interface FloatInputProducer
    A FloatInputProducer is a way to subscribe to notifications of changes in a float input's value. By convention, most float inputs and outputs have states that range from -1.0f to 1.0f.
    See Also:
    FloatOutput

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTarget(FloatOutput output)
      Subscribe to changes in this float input's value.
      boolean removeTarget(FloatOutput output)
      Unsubscribe from changes in this float input's value.

    • Method Detail

      • addTarget

        void addTarget(FloatOutput output)
        Subscribe to changes in this float input's value. The float output will be modified whenever the value of this input changes. By convention, most float inputs and outputs have states that range from -1.0f to 1.0f.
        Parameters:
        output - The float output to notify when the value changes.
        See Also:
        FloatOutput.writeValue(float), removeTarget(ccre.chan.FloatOutput)

      • removeTarget

        boolean removeTarget(FloatOutput output)
        Unsubscribe from changes in this float input's value. This reverses the actions of a previous addTarget call. By convention, most float inputs and outputs have states that range from -1.0f to 1.0f.
        Parameters:
        output - The output to unsubscribe.
        Returns:
        Whether the output was actually subscribed.
        See Also:
        addTarget(ccre.chan.FloatOutput)
